arcanemissiles.label: Arcane Missiles
arcanemissiles.desc: Fire a number of arcane missiles equal to your Intelligence outward from you, each missile hitting a random enemy within range for 1d4 Arcane damage. Does an additional 1 damage per missile for each rank above 1.

blink.label: Blink
blink.desc: Immediately move to any spot within range of your speed and line of sight. Can be used while Slowed but not Rooted. This does not provoke an Attack of Opportunity. Adds 1 point of movement range for each rank above 1.

burninghands.label: Burning Hands
burninghands.desc: Spray fire in a 3m cone in front of you, all creatures within that area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 3d6+INT Fire damage. On save success they take half damage. Does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 1.

colourspray.label: Colour Spray
colourspray.desc:
A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from your hand. Roll 6d10, the total is how many 'health' of creatures this spell can effect. Creatures in a 3m cone originating from you are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring Unconscious creatures and creatures that can't see).

Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell is Blinded until the spell ends. Subtract each creature's hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest health. A creature's health must be equal to or less than the remaining total for the creature to be affected. For each rank above 1, the spell affects 2d10 health more creatures.

detectmagic.label: Detect Magic
detectmagic.desc: For the duration, you become generally aware of any magic effects within range and the school that they belong to.

firebolt.label: Fire Bolt
firebolt.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target within range. On hit they take 1d8+INT Fire damage. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 1.

fogcloud.label: Fog Cloud
fogcloud.desc: You summon a fog cloud originating at a point within range and spreading to cover a 3m cube, obscuring the area.

magearmour.label: Mage Armour
magearmour.desc: Touch a willing creature, granting it +2 Armour and +2 Spell armour.

identify.label: Identify
identify.desc: You instantly learn the magical properties of a magical item you are touching. If the item is not magical, the spell will have no effect.

sleep.label: Sleep
sleep.desc: Select a point within range, causing 5d8 health worth of creatures within a 3m cube originating at the chosen point to fall unconscious. For each rank above 1, this spell affects an additional 2d8 health worth of creatures.

thunderwave.label: Thunderwave
thunderwave.desc: Generate a thunderous wave of energy from yourself in a 3m cube. Each creature within the area must make a Constitution Saving Throw or take 2d6 Bludgeoning damage and be pushed back 2m. On success they take half damage and are not pushed. Does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 1.

acidarrow.label: Acid Arrow
acidarrow.desc: A shimmering green arrow streaks toward a target within range and bursts in a spray of acid. Make a Ranged Spell Attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d4+INT acid damage immediately and 2d4 acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the arrow splashes the target with acid for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn. Does an additional 1d4 damage (both initial and later) for each rank above 2.

arcanelock.label: Arcane Lock
arcanelock.desc:
You touch a closed door, window, gate, chest, or other entryway, and it becomes locked for the duration. You and the creatures you designate when you cast this spell can open the object normally. You can also set a password that, when spoken within 1m of the object, suppresses this spell for 1 minute. Otherwise, it is impassable until it is broken or the spell is dispelled or suppressed. Casting knock on the object suppresses arcane lock for 10 minutes.

While affected by this spell, the object is more difficult to break or force open; the DC to break it or pick any locks on it increases by 10.

blur.label: Blur
blur.desc: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you. For the duration, any creature has Disadvantage on Attack rolls against you. An attacker is immune to this effect if it doesn't rely on sight, as with Blindsight, or can see through illusions, as with Truesight.

darkvision.label: Darkvision
darkvision.desc: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark. For the Duration, that creature has darkvision out to a range of 15m.

enlargereduce.label: Enlarge Reduce
enlargereduce.desc:
You cause a creature or an object you can see within range to grow larger or smaller for the duration. Choose either a creature or an object that is neither worn nor carried. If the target is unwilling, it can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the spell has no effect. If the target is a creature, everything it is wearing and carrying changes size with it. Any item dropped by an affected creature returns to normal size at once.

Enlarge: The target's size doubles in all dimensions, and its weight is multiplied by eight. This growth increases its size by one category - from Medium to Large, for example. If there isn't enough room for the target to double its size, the creature or object attains the maximum possible size in the space available. Until the spell ends, the target also has advantage on Strength Checks and Strength saving throws. The target's Weapons also grow to match its new size. While these Weapons are enlarged, the target's Attack with them deal 1d4 extra damage.

Reduce:The target's size is halved in all dimensions, and its weight is reduced to one-eighth of normal. This reduction decreases its size by one category - from Medium to Small, for example. Until the spell ends, the target also has disadvantage on Strength Checks and Strength saving throws. The target's Weapons also shrink to match its new size. While these Weapons are reduced, the target's attacks with them deal 1d4 less damage (this can't reduce the damage below 1).

flamingsphere.label: Flaming Sphere
flamingsphere.desc:
A 1m diameter Sphere of fire appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the Duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 1m of the Sphere must make an Agility Saving Throw. The creature takes 2d6+INT fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the Sphere up to 5m. If you ram the Sphere into a creature, that creature must make the saving throw against the sphere's damage, and the Sphere stops moving this turn. The sphere does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 2.

invisibility.label: Invisibility
invisibility.desc: A creature you touch becomes Invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is Invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell. For each rank above 2, the spell can affect an additional target.

knock.label: Knock
knock.desc:
Choose an object that you can see within range. The object can be a door, a box, a chest, a set of Manacles, a padlock, or another object that contains a mundane or magical means that prevents access.

A target that is held shut by a mundane lock or that is stuck or barred becomes unlocked, unstuck, or unbarred. If the object has multiple locks, only one of them is unlocked.

If you choose a target that is held shut with Arcane Lock, that spell is suppressed for 10 minutes, during which time the target can be opened and shut normally.

When you cast the spell, a loud knock, audible from as far away as 100m, emanates from the target object.

levitate.label: Levitate
levitate.desc:
One creature or object of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically, up to 1m, and remains suspended there for the Duration. The spell can levitate a target that weighs up to 200kg. An unwilling creature that succeeds on a Constitution Saving Throw is unaffected.

The target can move only by pushing or pulling against a fixed object or surface within reach (such as a wall or a ceiling), which allows it to move as if it were climbing. Otherwise, you can use your action to move the target, which must remain within the spell's range.

locateobject.label: Locate Object
locateobject.desc:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 1km of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its Movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you, as long as you have seen it up close (within 10m) at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewelry, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell can't locate an object if any thickness of lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between you and the object.

magicweapon.label: Magic Weapon
magicweapon.desc: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon is considered a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to Attack rolls and Damage Rolls. For every 2 ranks above 2, the effect is increased by an addition +1.

scorchingray.label: Scorching Ray
scorchingray.desc:
You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several.

Make a Ranged Spell Attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes 2d6+INT fire damage. For each rank above 2, an additional ray is created.

seeinvisible.label: See Invisible
seeinvisible.desc: For the duration, you see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible, and you can see into the Ethereal Plane. Ethereal creatures and objects appear ghostly and translucent.

shatter.label: Shatter
shatter.desc:
A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range. Each creature in a 3m cube centered on that point must make a Constitution Saving Throw. A creature takes 3d8+INT Bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature made of inorganic material such as stone, crystal, or metal has disadvantage on this saving throw.

A nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried also takes the damage if it's in the spell's area. For each rank above 2, the spell does an additional 1d8 damage.

bane.label: Bane
bane.desc: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma Saving Throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an Attack roll or a Saving Throw before the spell ends, the target must subtract 1d4 from their roll. For each rank above 1, the spell can affect an additional target.

bless.label: Bless
bless.desc: Up to three friendly creatures of your choice that you can see within range are blessed for the duration. Whenever a target makes an Attack roll or a Saving Throw before the spell ends, the target can add 1d4 to their roll. For each rank above 1, the spell can affect an additional target.

heal.label: Heal
heal.desc: A creature within range gains 1d8+SPI health. For each spell slot above 1, it heals an additional 1d8 health.

detectpoisonanddisease.label: Detect Poison and Disease
detectpoisonanddisease.desc: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 10m of you. You also identify the kind of poison, poisonous creature, or disease in each case.

guidingbolt.label: Guiding Bolt
guidingbolt.desc: You fire a shimmering bolt of light at a target enemy within range. Make a Ranged Spell Attack, if it hits the target takes 3d6+SPI light damage and the next attack roll against this creature gains Advantage. For each rank above 1, the target takes an additional 1d6 damage.

purify.label: Purify
purify.desc: All nonmagical food and drink within a 2m cube centered on a point of your choice within range is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

protection.label: Protection
protection.desc: You grant an aura of holy protection to a friendly creature within range, that target gains +2 to Dodge for the duration.

sanctuary.label: Sanctuary
sanctuary.desc: You ward a friendly creature within range, any creatures attacking your target must make a Spirit Saving Throw vs your spell DC. If they fail, their attack is prevented. If your target is affected by any attacks, the ward is removed.

animalfriendship.label: Animal Friendship
animalfriendship.desc: This spell lets you convince a beast that you mean it no harm. Choose a beast that you can see within range, that can also see and hear you. If the beast's Intelligence is 4 or higher, the spell fails. Otherwise, the beast must succeed on a Charisma Saving Throw or be Charmed by you for the spell's duration. If you or one of your companions harms the target, the spells ends.

entangle.label: Entangle
entangle.desc:
Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 5m square starting from a point within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain.

A creature in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Strength Saving Throw or be Restrained by the entangling plants until the spell ends. A creature Restrained by the plants can use its action to make a Strength Check against your Spell DC. On a success, it frees itself.

faeriefire.label: Faerie Fire
faeriefire.desc:
Each object in a 5m cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is also outlined in light if it fails an Agility Saving Throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed dim light in a 2m radius.

Any Attack roll against an affected creature or object has Advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature or object can't benefit from being Invisible.

speakwithanimals.label: Speak With Animals
speakwithanimals.desc: You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration. The knowledge and awareness of many beasts is limited by their Intelligence, but at minimum, beasts can give you information about nearby locations and Monsters, including whatever they can perceive or have perceived within the past day. You might be able to persuade a beast to perform a small favor for you, at the DM's discretion.
